Saari

Strategy

Digital Law

Digital Transformation

A comprehensive legal framework including confidentiality agreements, terms & conditions of service and privacy policies for a brand new children’s apparel brand and eCommerce proposition.

Brief

Saari were tasked to define and deliver a structured legal framework required to launch a new children’s eCommerce apparel brand and protect the company's rights in the digital field.

Approach

Considering the relevant facets relating to the use and application of data and websites in the context of digital law in the field of eCommerce. Taking into account the potential and existing global audience and customer base in order to design and implement a legal framework mindful of the impending changes coming into effect as a result of the GDPR in the international legal context.

Outcome

A concise and regulatory compliant legal framework, including website terms and conditions, privacy & cookies policies, contract documentation and confidentiality agreements for a small business with a global ambition in order to fully support and safeguard KOO's brand strategy and eCommerce development.
